name: Hotdish (White over black)
description:
New for 2013!

A sassy update of a typical 1950s "hostess" apron!  Full circle skirt, halter bodice, and a satin ribbon sash.  Edged with contrasting bias tape.

Options include black or red sash.

One size fits most.

options.name: White top, black skirt, black sash
White top, black skirt, red sash

name: Hotdish (Black over white)
description:
New for 2013!

A sassy update of a typical 1950s "hostess" apron!  Full circle skirt, halter bodice, and a satin ribbon sash.  Edged with contrasting bias tape.

Options include black or red sash and two color combinations.

One size fits most.

options.name: Black top, white skirt, black sash
Black top, white skirt, red sash

name: Vintage Trailer (Spice style)
description:
A fabulous fabric--vintage trailers and trucks in Rocky Mountain settings.   Yale blue rick rack and scarlet--or light blue--bias trim.    

Smooth neck band lays flat and is not adjustable--perfect for those who don't care for neck ties.  Waist ties make a good-sized bow in back.  

Great pockets—ample in size and in just the right spot.

Fits ladies small through large.

name: Airstream (Spice style)
description:
It's the 50s way of relaxing, from the vintage trailers to roasting weenies.  Avocado rick rack and red bias trim.    

Smooth neck band lays flat and is not adjustable--perfect for those who don't care for neck ties.  Waist ties make a good-sized bow in back.  

Great pockets—ample in size and in just the right spot.

Fits ladies small through large.

name: Scoops (Spice style)

Ice cream cones!  Aqua rick rack and pink bias trim--or pink rick rack and seal brown bias trim.   

Smooth neck band lays flat and is not adjustable--perfect for those who don't care for neck ties.  Waist ties make a good-sized bow in back.  

Great pockets—ample in size and in just the right spot.

Fits ladies small through large.

Pink rick rack, seal brown bias trim

Smooth neck band lays flat and is not adjustable--perfect for those who don't care for neck ties.  Waist ties make a good-sized bow in back.  

Great pockets—ample in size and in just the right spot.

A nostalgic print featuring French themes--landmarks, maps, and French script. Brick rick rack and seal brown bias trim.

Smooth neck band lays flat and is not adjustable--perfect for those who don't care for neck ties. Waist ties make a good-sized bow in back.

Great pockets—ample in size and in just the right spot.

Fits ladies small through large.

name: Mocha (Spice style)
description:
Colorful coffee cups on a black background.   Purple rick rack and Mediterranean blue bias trim.    

Smooth neck band lays flat and is not adjustable--perfect for those who don't care for neck ties.  Waist ties make a good-sized bow in back.  

Great pockets—ample in size and in just the right spot.

Fits ladies small through large.

name: Symmetry (Pepper style)
description:
A stately print in black and cream; rblack piping and polyester grosgrain ribbon ties.

This style is a variation of the "Flame" style with ribbon ties, a straight neckline, and a shorter body which brings the flounce just below your hips--perfect for sashaying around the kitchen!

Fits small- to medium-sized women.

Ties in the back.

name: Black Cherry (Pepper style)
description:
Michael Miller's fabulous cherry print on a black background; red piping and polyester grosgrain ribbon ties.

This style is a variation of the "Flame" style with ribbon ties, a straight neckline, and a shorter body which brings the flounce just below your hips--perfect for sashaying around the kitchen!

Fits small- to medium-sized women.

Ties in the back.

name: Day of the Dead (Pepper style)
description:
Can skulls look happy?  These do! Scarlet piping and polyester grosgrain ribbon ties.

This style is a variation of the "Flame" style with ribbon ties, a straight neckline, and a shorter body which brings the flounce just below your hips--perfect for sashaying around the kitchen!

Fits small- to medium-sized women.

Ties in the back.

name: Cherries (Flame style)
description:
“Flame” style in a Michael Miller cherry print.  Scarlet piping and matching bow.  Adjustable ties at neck.  Waist ties are long enough for a big bow in the back or wrap them round to the front for a waist-defining look.

Bottom flounce is smoothly eased into body of apron for lots of fullness and movement without the bulkiness of a gathered ruffle.  So flattering front, side, and back!

Fits ladies small through large.

name: Rooster (Flame style)
description:
“Flame” style in a terrific rooster print.  Black piping and matching bow.  Adjustable ties at neck.  Waist ties are long enough for a big bow in the back or wrap them round to the front for a waist-defining look.

Bottom flounce is smoothly eased into body of apron for lots of fullness and movement without the bulkiness of a gathered ruffle.  So flattering front, side, and back!

Fits ladies small through large.

Bottom flounce is smoothly eased into body of apron for lots of fullness and movement without the bulkiness of a gathered ruffle.  So flattering front, side, and back!

Fits ladies small through large.

name: France (Flame style)
description:
“Flame” style in a nostalgic print featuring French themes.  Brick piping and matching bow.  Adjustable ties at neck.  Waist ties are long enough for a big bow in the back or wrap them round to the front for a waist-defining look.

Bottom flounce is smoothly eased into body of apron for lots of fullness and movement without the bulkiness of a gathered ruffle.  So flattering front, side, and back!

Fits ladies small through large.

name: Day of the Dead (Sizzle style)
description:
“Sizzle” style in a Day of the Dead design. Scarlet bias trim and ties. 

Has a sassy A-line skirt silhouette.  Adjustable ties at neck and waist.

Fits pre-teens through ladies medium.  On smaller women the apron can overlap in the back, with the waist ties wrapping to the front, tied in a small bow.

name: Polka Dot (Sizzle style)
description:
“Sizzle” style in a classic black and off-white polka dot print. Off-white bias trim and ties. 

Has a sassy A-line skirt silhouette.  Adjustable ties at neck and waist.

Fits pre-teens through ladies medium.  On smaller women the apron can overlap in the back, with the waist ties wrapping to the front, tied in a small bow.

Has a sassy A-line skirt silhouette.  Adjustable ties at neck and waist.

Fits pre-teens through ladies medium.  On smaller women the apron can overlap in the back, with the waist ties wrapping to the front, tied in a small bow.

name: Vines (Sizzle style)
description:
“Sizzle” style in a stylized vine print. Black bias trim and ties. Design matched perfectly on pockets.

Has a sassy A-line skirt silhouette.  Adjustable ties at neck and waist.

Fits pre-teens through ladies medium.  On smaller women the apron can overlap in the back, with the waist ties wrapping to the front, tied in a small bow.
